meanings.definition: Approaching or coming forward in time or order.
meanings.sent1: The oncomings storm clouds signaled a change in the weather.
meanings.sent2: The oncomings train arrived right on schedule.
meanings.sent3: The oncomings birthday party was a surprise for Sarah.
meanings.sent4: The oncomings sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The oncomings school year brought new challenges and opportunities.

meanings.definition: The act of coming forward or approaching.
meanings.sent1: We waited at the intersection for the oncomings of cars to pass.
meanings.sent2: The oncomings of visitors to the museum increased during the summer.
meanings.sent3: The oncomings of puppies running towards us were adorable.
meanings.sent4: The oncomings of waves crashing against the shore were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The oncomings of students rushing to class created a bustling hallway.
